title: LEGO The Incredibles
notes:
Generally the game runs smoothly. Sound issues as in background music only (sound effect stop functioning fairly often). The minimap has graphic glitches (red tearing) but there is a game breaking bug when you are jackjack vs racoon. 

Fight for a period and then when you are bashing X then B and kick the racoon into the pool the screen just holds on a poolside view... its not frozen as such as steam can be seen BUT no way past this

title: LEGO® The Incredibles
notes: Sound effects won't work but game runs fine with everything else
